title: Jinx's Q Bug
body:
Jinx's Q can be used infinitely (kind of) without the mana toll.
The Q rocket still takes away your mana, but when you have less than 20 mana in your pool, the mana will just drop to 0.
What I mean by this is that when you have less than the required amount of mana, you can still fire Jinx's Q rocket for a grand total of....

One autoattack. Not extremely game-breaking, and it possibly could've just been the one game, so I'll need to test it again.
You can use this bug infinitely, although it isn't really worth doing it.

People could possibly abuse this by spamming q constantly while autoattacking. This would be a real pain, but would still abuse the bug.

Steps to reproduce;
1) Get below 20 mana in your mana pool as Jinx.
2) Press Q to equip rocket and autoattack a target.
3) You're mana will drop to 0 unless you're above 20 mana. The autoattack will still fire as if it was a rocket with the proper amount of mana.
4) Jinx will instantly switch back to Powpow once she fires the autoattack.
5) Press Q again to fire one autoattack Q rocket.

I did forward it!

 It appears to be a larger issue, and we're still investigating it, which is why you didn't see it in the patch notes. :c

Mildly off topic, but it is about Jinx. In the 6.1 patch notes, they claimed a 'bug' was fixed in that Jinx was able to use Switcharoo while stunned, but this was actually an intentional change added in 5.23

> Ability Toggling
> For the times where you thought you switched to Fishbones but Leona was still smacking you in the face with a shield.
> #WHERE ARE MY ROCKETS Togglable abilities with no on-use effect can now be switched while under the effects of crowd control:
> Aatrox's W - Blood Thirst/Blood Price
> Cho'Gath's E - Vorpal Spikes
> #Jinx's Q - Switcheroo!
It was directly tied to the "free rocket while OOM" bug.  Needed to revert the change to assure free rockets no longer happen.
Awh, okay. At least it's being investigated though! Better than nothing. Thanks for being amazing and welcome back! Haven't seen you post around here in 2-3 weeks!
